Package client

Class PentagoClientHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.PentagoClientHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientHandler, java.lang.Runnable
    public class PentagoClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientHandler
    Class that represents a client handler that communicates with a pentago server client.
    Author:
    Aliaksei Kouzel
